Requirement

  • Passport
  • Voter ID card copy
  • Birth certificate
  • Bank Solvency original
  • Bank statement original 6 months minimum
  • balance- as per your traveling expenses
  • Marriage certificate
  • Trade license
  • Company memorandum
  • Air Booking
  • Travel Health Insurance
  • Tour plan

China visit visa for Business Person
  • A passport valid for at least six months.
  • 2 (Two) copies recent Passport size-photo (White background)
  • Original Bank statement & Solvency Certificate (At Least for 6 Months with minimum balance of Tk. 1,50,000).
  • Trade License with renewal page.
  • Visiting card.
  • Blank letter pad.
  • TIN certificate photocopy.
  • National ID card photocopy.
  • 2 (Two) Bangladeshi referenceâ€™s Name, Address, Phone number.

Indian visit visa for Business Person
  • Online Visa Application Form.
  • Original Passport (6 Months Validity is required) with photo copy.
  • Photocopy of last Indian visa copy. (If visited)
  • 2 (Two) Copies Recent Photo (Size: W 2 inch X H 2 inch with White Background).
  • 200 US Dollar Endorsement with Original Certificate from any Bank / Six months Bank Statement.
  • Utility Bill Copy.
  • Visiting Card.
  • Leave certificate.
  • National ID card /Birth Certificate (Which one is shown on Passport).

Malaysia visit visa for Business Person
  • Online Visa Application Form.
  • Original Passport (6 Months Validity is required) with photo copy.
  • Photocopy of last Indian visa copy. (If visited)
  • 2 (Two) Copies Recent Photo (Size: W 2 inch X H 2 inch with White Background).
  • 200 US Dollar Endorsement with Original Certificate from any Bank / Six months Bank Statement.
  • Utility Bill Copy.
  • Visiting Card.
  • Leave certificate.
  • National ID card /Birth Certificate (Which one is shown on Passport).

Dubai visit visa for Business Person
  • Online Visa Application Form.
  • Original Passport (6 Months Validity is required) with photo copy.
  • Photocopy of last Indian visa copy. (If visited)
  • 2 (Two) Copies Recent Photo (Size: W 2 inch X H 2 inch with White Background).
  • 200 US Dollar Endorsement with Original Certificate from any Bank / Six months Bank Statement.
  • Utility Bill Copy.
  • Visiting Card.
  • Leave certificate.
  • National ID card /Birth Certificate (Which one is shown on Passport).
